id: 04-02 draft ESRS-GRI Interoperability Index SR TEG meeting 5 December.txt_chunk33
text:
301-3 Reclaimed products and their 'Resource outflows related to (2b)
packaging materials products and services' and 'Waste'
are sustainability matters for E5
covered by ESRS 1 §AR 16.
Hence this GRI disclosure is
covered by MDR-P, MDR-A,
MDR-T, and/or as an entity-
specific metric to be disclosed
according to ESRS 1 §11 and
pursuant to MDR-M.
GRI 302: Energy 3-3 Management of material topics ESRS E1 E1-2 §25 (c) to (d); E1-3
2016 §26; E1-4 §33
source: 04-02 draft ESRS-GRI Interoperability Index SR TEG meeting 5 December.txt
